data.title: Victor Salva
data.text:
Born: 29-Mar-1958

Birthplace: Martinez, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Gay

Occupation: Film Director

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Jeepers Creepers

Molested the 12-year-old star of his first film Clownhouse. Based on the boy's statement that the director had molested him on camera, Salva confessed and was found guilty of five felony child sex abuse charges in 1988.

High School: (1976)

Child Molestation 1988 (five counts, convicted)

Lewd Act upon a Child 1988

Child Pornography procuring a child for pornography

Inmate: Soledad Prison

Registered As Sex Offender

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

Jeepers Creepers III (26-Sep-2017)

Rosewood Lane (15-Oct-2011)

Peaceful Warrior (2-Jun-2006)

Jeepers Creepers II (16-May-2003)

Jeepers Creepers (20-Jul-2001)

Rites of Passage (27-Oct-1999)

Powder (27-Oct-1995)

Nature of the Beast (1995)

Clownhouse (Jan-1989)

Appears in articles:

San Francisco Examiner, 25-Oct-1995, DETAILS: Molest Victim Protests At Disney Film Release, BYLINE: Jim Herron Zamora

Los Angeles Times, 31-Oct-1995, DETAILS: Film Draws Well Despite Molestation Controversy, BYLINE: Robert W. Welkos, Judy Brennan

Entertainment Weekly, 10-Nov-1995, DETAILS: A Question Disney Ducked, BYLINE: Jeffrey Wells, Lisa Karlin

St. Petersberg Times, 01-Sep-2000, DETAILS: Film director's past worries school officials
